data.message: How can Facebook get away with running a scam? When I paid to boost a post it said it'd reach 3,400-9,100 people. When the boost was done it reached only 352 people. Rip off for sure!!

replies.message: And I have screen shots to prove it.
I see Facebook isn't inclined to respond. lol How can I contact them directly?

Hi Greg. It's possible your post was affected by other boosted posts running at that same time. To learn more, please visit this link to our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1uRmG2J. We hope this helps! -Rose
To only reach 1/10th of what you said I would is a joke. I will no longer boost post as it's a rip off. I might understand that logic if I even reach half of what it said I would.
